statements: DELETE FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_location = 'Room A' AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM sensor_data WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND sensor_location = 'Room A';
DELETE FROM historical_sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 10 AND reading_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM sensor_metadata WHERE owner = 'John Smith' AND installation_date < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM historical_sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 10 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01 00:00:00'
DELETE FROM sensor_locations WHERE location = 'Laboratory' AND sensor_id = 15
DELETE FROM sensor_metadata WHERE location = 'Room A';
